message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm happy to start the conversation at $12,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product considering its value to me.
Bob, thanks for your offer, but I can't quite let it go for $9,000.  I'm confident this product will bring you a lot of value, even at a price of $11,000. How about we meet in the middle?
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $10,000. Can you consider that?
